meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Cherkis Tana Lee Roger Christensen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4030.

div.div: (Sarah: Jeopardy! will get your mind and your body in shape--coming up next.)

td.p: Dan Cherkis, a software developer from Richmond, Virginia
Tana Lee, a sales assistant from Washington, D.C.
Roger Christensen, a registered nurse and pre-med student from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,300)

tr.td: A CATEGORY ABOUT NOTHING
JUST COS
MUSIC STYLES
FITNESS
FIRST LADIES' RHYME TIME

Harding

RogerDan
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Laughter as Tana\'s response is revealed] Please, no editorializing
when you come up with a correct response.)
tanaWhat are the Baltimore Ravens? (Yuck!)
$5,800
DanWhat are Baltimore Ravens?
$12,000
RogerWhat are the Baltimore Ravens?
$15,000
Baltimore Ravens')

tana

(including 2 DDs),
